com.teamten.render
Class BoundingBox

java.lang.Object
  com.teamten.render.BoundingBox

public class BoundingBox
extends Object

Represents an axis-aligned box that bounds some geometry, including a list of that geometry and possible nested bounding boxes.

Constructor Summary
BoundingBox()
          Create an infinite empty box.
 
Method Summary
 void addTriangle(Triangle triangle)
           
 void breakUpLargeTriangles(double maxRatio)
          Break up triangles that are larger than maxRatio of the bounding box itself.

          Build a tree below this node.
 List<BoundingBox> getChildList()
          Returns the list of child bounding boxes in this bounding box.
 int getDeepChildCount()
          Return the total number of children below this node, including this node.
 double getSize()
          Return the diagonal size of the bounding box.
 List<Triangle> getTriangleList()
          Returns the list of triangles in this bounding box.
 boolean intersectsRay(Vector r0, Vector r, double maxT, boolean debug)
          Returns whether the ray intersects the bounding box.
